channel.title: Missing Persons Resources
channel.description: Recent content on Missing Persons Resources

item.title: About
item.description:
Hello!

I’m Tsvetelina, and I’ve been involved in missing persons work for quite some time. I’m passionate about helping others and raising awareness about missing persons cases. I noticed there wasn’t a centralized portal where people could easily find information about government and non-government agencies that handle missing persons cases. That’s why I’m creating resources to help families and investigators access the information they need.

This website serves as a comprehensive directory of missing persons databases and organizations from around the world. My goal is to provide easy access to resources that can help locate missing individuals and support families in their search.

item.title: Australia
item.description:
Missing Persons Resources in Australia

  • Missing Persons Search
    Australian missing persons search database

  • Victoria Police Missing Persons
    Victoria Police missing persons list

  • NSW Police Missing Persons
    New South Wales Police missing persons search

  • Australian Missing Persons Register
    Comprehensive Australian missing persons register

  • Queensland Police Missing Persons
    Queensland Police missing persons information

item.title: Austria
item.description:
Missing Persons Resources in Austria

  • Österreich findet euch Missing Persons
    Austrian missing persons database and information platform

  • Meinbezirk Missing Persons Search
    Austrian regional news site with missing persons search and information

item.title: Brazil
item.description:
Missing Persons Resources in Brazil

  • Cadastro Nacional de Pessoas Desaparecidas
    National Registry of Missing Persons maintained by the Ministry of Justice and Public Security of Brazil.

  • Desaparecidos do Brasil
    Search database for missing persons in Brazil, maintained by a private organization.

  • Pessoas Desaparecidas no Estado do Paraná
    Missing persons database for the state of Paraná, maintained by the Paraná State Civil Police.

  • Desaparecidos - Polícia Civil RS
    Missing persons database for the state of Rio Grande do Sul, maintained by the Rio Grande do Sul State Civil Police.

item.title: Canada
item.description:
Missing Persons Resources in Canada

  • Canada’s Missing
    Government of Canada missing persons website

  • Missing People Canada Cold Cases
    Canadian missing persons cold cases database

  • Missing Child Canada
    Canadian missing children resource center

  • SACP Missing Persons
    Saskatchewan Association of Chiefs of Police missing persons database

  • Aboriginal Alert
    Alert system for missing Indigenous persons in Canada

  • MissingKids.ca Database
    Canadian Centre for Child Protection missing children database

  • Canada Unsolved
    Canadian unsolved cases and missing persons database

item.title: Global Coverage Map
item.description:
This interactive world map shows all countries where I have collected missing persons resources and information. Countries highlighted in green have available resources in my database, while countries in gray currently have no listed resources.

The map provides a visual overview of my database’s geographical coverage, helping users quickly identify which countries have missing persons support services available.

Database Overview

  • Total Countries with Resources: 20
  • Total Resources Listed: 83 websites and databases
  • Geographical Coverage: Europe, North America, Oceania, Asia, and Africa

Featured Countries

My database includes comprehensive coverage for major countries like Germany (17 resources), United States (14 resources), and Canada (10 resources), as well as emerging coverage in countries across multiple continents.

item.title: Social Feed
item.description:
Stay updated with the latest developments in missing persons cases and related news.

Note: This page embeds content from official Facebook pages of missing persons organizations. I do not host or store any of this content; it is loaded directly from Facebook.

Facebook Feeds

item.description:
Missing Persons Resources in the United Kingdom

item.title: United States
item.description:
Missing Persons Resources in the United States

  • National Missing and Unidentified Persons System (NamUs)
    National system for missing, unidentified, and unclaimed persons

  • The Charley Project
    Online registry of missing persons cases and unidentified remains

  • The Doe Network
    Volunteer organization maintaining missing persons and unidentified remains databases

  • FBI Missing Persons
    FBI’s wanted persons and missing children

  • National Center for Missing & Exploited Children (NCMEC)
    Resources for missing and exploited children with search functionality
